patthana21.3:1.1_0: Nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca nakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca kusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.
patthana21.3:1.1_1: Nava pañhā kātabbā.) Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
patthana21.3:2.1_0: Nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca naakusalo dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca akusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo. (Saṅkhittaṁ.
patthana21.3:2.1_1: Nava pañhā kātabbā.) Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā upanissaye nava.
patthana21.3:3.1_0: Nahetu ceva nahetuvippayutto ca naabyākato dhammo hetussa ceva hetusampayuttassa ca abyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … tīṇi. (Saṅkhittaṁ.
patthana21.3:3.1_1: Nava pañhā kātabbā.) Ārammaṇe adhipatiyā anantare samanantare upanissaye nava, kamme tīṇi, natthiyā vigate nava.
